freelance.title: Berry Game Calls eCommerce Website
freelance.description: I am currently working on building a custom website to meet the needs of my parents' family business. The new site aims to improve user experience with a fresh design, full page product previews, search, product categories to filter by, an easily accessible shopping cart, video and photo gallery, returning customer login, and a secure checkout. The full scope of the project will include a separate login for wholesale retailers to replace their current fax and phone system. (The demo is currently supported in both mobile and desktop Chrome, Firefox and Safari with support for Edge and Internet Explorer coming soon.)

freelance.title: Doodle App
freelance.description: For this project our client requested a simplified version of Adobe Illustrator with editable, scalable, and rotatable path drawing, text, and clip art, he can upload from an admin panel, to run on touchscreens for his on-site laser engraving business. To do this we utilized react and webgl to create an interactive doodle web app with custom path and text drawing that can be exported to svg or png as desired. The app also includes a preference panel so that he can change the clip art, text fonts, brush stroke width, and accent color throughout the app.

freelance.title: Instagram & Twitter Event Photo App
freelance.description: For this project, our client partnered with Jeep and the X-Games to combine social media and branding to create tangible, laser engraved, take-home gifts. To make this possible, we created a custom web app that ran on large touchscreens at the X-Games that enabled attendees to easily find and select their Instagram and Twitter photos tagged with the event hashtag and send them to the on-site laser engraver for printing.

freelance.title: Energy Code Etching
freelance.description: Our client needed a quick, user friendly solution for collecting and managing client energy codes in a spreadsheet and within a tight budget, so we built them a simple static website with some regex-formatted fields, to ensure correct code entry, that connected to their spreadsheet using Google Sheets API.

hobby.title: Aww Subreddit
hobby.description: A cute little feed especially built for r/aww. Features swipe right and left functionality to upvote and downvote, as well as views to see all your votes!

hobby.title: To Do Web App
hobby.description: My spin on the obligatory to do list web app, but with emojis and handy  date-separated interface. Best part it uses local storage, so go ahead open it up, bookmark it, list and conquer! (Currently supported in Chrome Desktop)

hobby.title: Archey Target iOS App
hobby.description: As a further exploration of SpriteKit, I built a simple archery target shooting game that includes gesture recognizers to calculate the direction and velocity of the arrow, scores the arrow based on the ring hit, and after level one has a moving target that gets increasingly faster.

hobby.title: Basketball Shooter iOS App
hobby.description: My own implementation of one level of Ketchapp's Basketball game built with gesture recognizers to simulate tossing the basketball, basic collision physics, scorekeeping and a shot clock.
